description: For breathable warmth and wind resistance on cold days in the alpine, the Coefficient Storm Hoody is the ideal do-it-all, cool-weather stretch shell. This jacket is built with a grid back that provides additional warmth and breathability, plus a wind and water- resistant coating that adds some midlayer warmth and abrasion resistance. A ¼ zip design with a single chest pocket and two hand pockets, the Coefficient Storm also can pack into its front hand pocket when the sun hits.
name: Black Diamond Coefficient Storm Full-Zip Hoody - Mens
